method: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the onions and the garlic. Cook for 2 minutes and then add the pumpkin, chopped apples and sage.  Cook for another 2 minutes, season well and add the stock and the cider or apple juice. Bring to the boil and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the ingredients are tender. Liquidise and serve piping hot with crusty bread.
ingredients: 2 onions, peeled and chopped,  1 clove garlic, peeled and crushed,  1 tbsp olive oil,  500g/1lb 2oz pumpkin, skinned, seeded and cubed,  2 baking apples, peeled, cored and chopped,  570ml/1 pint vegetables stock,  300ml/Â½ pint dry cider or apple juice,  2 sprigs fresh sage,  salt and freshly ground pepper
